message:
A federal class-action lawsuit filed Tuesday contends the FBI violated the First Amendment rights of hundreds of Muslims by using a paid informant to target and monitor several Southern California mosques.

“'Ironically, the operation ended when members of the Muslim communities of Southern California reported the informant to the police because of his violent rhetoric & ultimately obtained a restraining order against him,' the lawsuit alleged."

http://latimesblogs.latimes.com/lanow/2011/02/fbi-muslim-communities-lawsuit-aclu.html
